content: first piece and continue with next round round4 skip 1st st double_crochet tr2 double_crochet all in next st skip 1 slip_stitch in next skip 1 double_crochet 4 in next skip 1 slip_stitch in next double_crochet treble_crochet 3 in next st double_crochet slip_stitch in next 2 st skip 2 st double_crochet 5 in next skip next 2 slip_stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet 2 in next double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch and fo leaving a long tail for sewing with some embroidery floss you can turn your second piece of cloud into a happy smiling cloud assembly 1 holding your first piece of the cloud with the wrong side facing you place the rainbow onto the cloud as shown in the picture and use your white yarn tail to sew them together 3 | p age rainbow bookmark pattern © 2017 yum yarn crochet creations all rights reserved 2 take the second piece and put it on top of the first piece use the yarn tail and sew it onto the other piece and you re done enjoy your rainbow bookmark copyright © 2017 yum yarn crochet creations all rights reserved this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced sold distributed or translated without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit yum yarn as the designer i would love to see pictures of your finished doll on facebook or instagram if you have any questions please feel free to contact me e-mail yumyarncreations@gmail com facebook page yum yarn - crochet creations etsy yumyarnshop instagram yum_yarn ravelry yumyarncreations 4 | p age rainbow bookmark pattern © 2017 yum yarn crochet creations all rights reserved
